price: 76. « Je suis bien meilleur que lui, répondit Iblîs ; Tu m’as créé de feu et Tu l’as créé d’argile. »
arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla anā khayrun min'hu khalaqtanī min nārin wakhalaqtahu min ṭīnin
